metadata.description: Globally unique name that identifies your new function app. Valid characters are a-z, 0-9, and -.
The Azure function app runs on an App Service Plan. This is a unique name for the name of your app service plan.

Name of the storage account used by your function app. You can create a new one or use an existing one. Must be lowercase alphanumeric characters, globally unique, and between 3 and 24 characters in length.
This will be in format of '<your unique name>.azurewebsites.net'
